EmailTemplate.name: SM-2019-01-MS EoS - Thank You.EMAIL-Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Completing our Windows and SQL 2008 End of Support Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-vmware-ela/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4fVAAQ]]> <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-vmware-ela/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4fVAAQ]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for completing our Windows and SQL 2008 End of Support Survey, your insight is greatly appreciated! As a reward for your time, your $10 Amazon gift card is enclosed below.
The looming end of support dates has IT pros planning transitions. Forward-thinking organizations are using this opportunity to focus on the positive aspects of modernizing their stack by migrating to Azure and re-platforming, unlocking new application innovation. Attend the 30-minute live webinar, Prepare for End of Support: Windows and SQL 2008 Webinar on Wednesday, February 3rd at 11 A.M. ET <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-ms-eos/?utm_70157000001j55iAAA]]> to learn:
- Windows/SQL End of Support risks and options, - Advantages associated with new platform and software alternatives - How to create a Windows 2008 & SQL 2008 workload migration plan
Register now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-ms-eos/?utm_70157000001j55iAAA]]> and you'll be entered to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card. I hope to see you there! Regards, Megan
{{my.Gift 10:default=edit me}}
